name: INRidePhase
desc: Constants indicating the current ride status.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The state of the ride is unknown.

items.name: case received
items.desc: You have received the booking request and are processing it, but have not yet confirmed the request or communicated the pickup information to the driver of the vehicle.

items.name: case confirmed
items.desc: You have booked the ride and communicated the pickup information to the driver of the vehicle.

items.name: case ongoing
items.desc: The driver has picked up the user’s party and is en route to the destination.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The driver has transited through all of the waypoints and is now at the ride’s destination.

items.name: case approachingPickup
items.desc: The driver is approaching the pickup location.

items.name: case pickup
items.desc: The driver is at the pickup location.
